name: BASSZXTUNE
short_description:
This add-on adds a support for chiptune tracker formats to BASS audio library.

Supported extensions (not formats): $b, $m, as0, asc, ay, ayc, bin, cc3, chi, cop, dmm, dsq, dst, esv, fdi, ftc, gam, gamplus, gtr, hrm, hrp, lzs, m, msp, mtc, p, pcd, psc, psg, psm, pt1, pt2, pt3, s, scl, sid, sqd, sqt, st1, st3, stc, stp, str, szx, td0, tf0, tfc, tfd, tfe, tlz, tlzp, trd, trs, ts, txt, vtx, ym.

This add-on is a wrapper around libzxtune from ZXTune project.

ZXTune project: http://zxtune.bitbucket.org/
BASS audio library: http://www.un4seen.com/bass.html

The similar plugin for XMPlay:
https://sourceforge.net/projects/xmpzxtune/
summary: BASS audio library add-on based on ZXTune library
